title: [4] Transfer Manifest
contents: [Only the final part of the document is legible]
All outbound shipments must be packaged with appropriate documentation related to use, purpose, and relevant project development as defined in Article 7 of the "Project X" Charter.
All of these shipments have to be routed through the local delivery port before they can be shipped cross-country!
Make sure someone keeps an eye on those shipments while they wait in town, at least until the higher-ups get here.
The LAST thing we need is one of our shipments getting mixed up with some random civilian one.
